author: senh
title: Indoor 'beach' lures D.C. museum-goers
text: BING NEWS: No sharks, no sunscreen: Indoor ‘beach’ lures D.C. museum-goers (CNN) — You can walk the pier, purchase a snack and settle into a lounge chair with a good book. What you won’t find at “the Beach,” a temporary architectural installation at Washington’s National Building Museum, is water.
